transcript: I've always thought of Education as the ultimate Legacy if you die and you leave no education to anyone else would a waste of a life I don't know the guy who invented wallpaper windows glassic I don't know any of that stuff Edison made the light bulb and then we were like hey if we put 100 little ones in a row we have a screen everything we have is always piggybacking on past humans who we don't know the names of I foolheartedly expect to be another human that other people catapult off of that they all forget me I'm just trying to document as much as I can to try and pass on as much as is useful to other people and I think that when I die that will be what I am proud of
